mapper.sql:
FROM cc a WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq = #{shValue} AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND useNy LIKE CONCAT ('%',0,'%') AND useNy LIKE CONCAT ('%',1,'%')
AND delNy LIKE CONCAT ('%',0,'%') AND delNy LIKE CONCAT ('%',1,'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.name ,a.oder ,a.ccg_seq ,a.useNy ,a.delNy ,a.creDate ,a.modDate
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT * FROM cc WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq ,name ,ccg_seq ,oder FROM cc WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND useNy = 1
